headline: Ecolab (ECL) to Benefit From Favorable Macroeconomic Backdrop
summary: Ecolab Inc (NYSE:ECL) is one of the best Materials stocks to invest in according to Hedge Funds. On January 8, Bank of America Securities analyst Matthew DeYoe reaffirmed his positive outlook on Ecolab Inc (NYSE:ECL). The analyst assigned a Buy rating to the stock and raised his price target from $312 to $314. DeYoe’s forecasts […]
